node.name: Xcarecrows 4 XML
node.shortdescription:
Xcarecrows 4 XML is a simple though efficient graphical editor to perform the daily tasks required when working with XML documents.

Features

  • a graphical XML documents, XML Schema and XML stylesheets editor
  • a graphical XML tree comparator
  • a built-in checker against XML schemas
  • an XSL transformations tool kit
  • an open, customizable, XML graphic layer

Packaging

  • Windows and Linux support (platform neutral Java)
  • Standalone zip archive or online installation with Eclipse updater
  • User documentation
  • Installation guide

Licensing
Xcarecrows 4 XML is available under the Open Source Apache">http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0">Apache License version 2. The companion XML graphic toolkit is licensed under the Eclipse">http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html">Eclipse Public License Version 1.0.

Changes from version 1.3.7

  • Open broken XML/XSL/XSD files in a text view so that the user can fix them

Changes from version 1.3.6

  • Fixed a bug where the dirty flag was not correctly set for multiple editors (Xcarecrows 4 XGT)
  • The documentation includes the Xcarecrows 4 XGT Javadoc plugin

Changes from version 1.3.5

  • Fixed a bug where editing of namespace including XML files failed with some JRE

Changes from version 1.3.4

  • Multiple editor feature
  • Audit of existing error messages

Changes from version 1.3.2

  • XML file renames are correctly detected in the navigator view
  • Users are prompted for confirmation before removal of edited files

Changes from version 1.3.1

  • Fixed a bug in the UI of the XML comparator when no file is currently edited (updated to version 1.3.9 of Xcarecrows4XGT)
